page.title: 07Resident origin Rawreth
page.content: 30 Rawreth residents were asked where they lived before .5 have always lived here,11 came from Essex,9 from London, 2 from Kent and 1 each from Cornwall, Sussex and Bristol.11 have moved less than 30 miles,12 between 30 and 50 miles and 2 over 100 miles.This shows 84% have moved into the area,only 16% have always lived here.It also shows that the further the distance,the fewer people who have moved.Only 1 came from Cornwall,but 9 came from London and 11 from Essex.Essex is an area of rising population and these figures show from where some have come.Many people have moved east,away from London.Those who have moved a long distance reflect the trend for people to move into the south east of England.
